title: When intelligence doesn’t count
author: VD
content_html: Just ask Stanford. I have a feeling that if you compared the average SAT scores of the Cardinal versus Alabama, the former would almost double the latter. Doesn’t always help on the basketball court, obviously.
content_text: Just ask Stanford.  I have a feeling that if you compared the average SAT scores of the Cardinal versus Alabama, the former would almost double the latter.  Doesn’t always help on the basketball court, obviously.
